changes.content: DrawCurrentLayer: Fix improper drawing when switching to the light layer (thanks @Colorblind for the report).
Changelog: Added history up to 1.3.0
About: Dropped some names in there.
TokenEditor: add a special hint for when the user is not a GM.
TokenEditor: update bar current/max values when linking bar to an attribute.
TokenEditor: replace attribute dropdown with search box that autocompletes.
TokenEditor: sort attributes lexicographically (thanks @DoomRice for the report).
TokenLayerDrawing: fix improper overlay positioning on mirrored tokens (thanks @DoomRice for the report).
New welcome message.
Dialog: fix invalid success value when ESCaping out of a dialog
Dialog: improved visuals, sizes.
TableIO: add a table repo URL to the paste dialog.
Fixed a typo in the token editor message for not having permissions to view the default token.
Fixed a case where the token editor would not update the default token fully.
Fixed the token editor assuming the player cannot view the default token when the character simply doesn't have a default token.
Added Token Editor: a new character sheet tab for fast token editing.
Added the Hide Player List module: it hides the player list.
Added an option to use units instead of squares in TokenResize.
Added a checkbox to the TokenResize dialog for moving the current selection.
Fixed TokenResize allowing the resizing of tokens to a size of 0.
Fixed potential memory leak when disabling modules.
Fixed player avatars in the alternative page toolbar menu.
